titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress in opposition to the efforts of certain groups to impose a sexual agenda on the children of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that it opposes the proposals of the Adolescent Pregnancy and Parenthood Advisory Council of Texas and the Sex Information and Education Council of the United States.
